resources.string: Describe the word displayed on the screen to your teammates. You cannot say words of the same family, words that sound similar, translate, or spell the words. When you teammates have guessed the words, press \"validate\", you can also skip a word by by pressing \"skip\".

Use 1 word to describe the word displayed on the screen to your teammates. You cannot say words of the same family, words that sound similar, translate, or spell the words. When you teammates have guessed the words, press \"validate\", you can also skip a word by by pressing \"skip\".

Mime the word displayed on the screen to your teammates. You cannot say words of the same family, words that sound similar, translate, or spell the words. When you teammates have guessed the words, press \"validate\", you can also skip a word by pressing \"skip\".
